title.rendered: FREE $10 Gift Card + Buy 3, Get 1 on ALL Toys + More!

content.rendered:
Gift Card Promotion

Don’t miss out on this deal! Through Christmas Eve, receive a FREE $10 gift card for every $25 gift card you buy. Gift cards redeemable after 12/25/2017; limit of 10 free cards. Gift cards spend like cash. Offer available at all four Gottwals Books locations.

 

Toy Sale: Buy 3 get 1 FREE

Stock up for Christmas with this amazing toy promotion! Our Buy 3, Get 1 Free sale goes through Christmas Eve. This promo includes ALL toy lines! Offer available at all four Gottwals Books locations.

 

Crazy Aaron’s Thinking Putty

Crazy Aaron’s Thinking Putty has been a hit with our customers! We now have their limited edition Holiday line. Stop by and check out the new additions and remember that toys are buy 3 get 1 FREE. The small putty tins would make amazing stocking stuffers, priced at only $2.97 each!

 

Christmas in Macon

Our Macon employees are so creative! Check out their Christmas Display.

 

Christmas Gift Ideas

Did you know Gottwals Books carries new in addition to used books? Check out our New Stock section this holiday season! Share the holiday classic The Polar Express. Put a smile on your young adults face with new copies of Dog Man, Wimpy Kid, or Dork Diaries. Have a teen you need to buy for? Try Renegades, Turtles All the Way Down, Warcross, or the Throne of Glass and Court of Thorns and Roses series by Sarah J. Maas. Don’t forget the adults! Capital Gaines, Shades of Magic, Game of Thrones, and Outlander are in our stores!

 

Newark, OH

The Walls of Books store in Newark, OH is looking great!

 

Elf on the Shelf

Keep the Elf on the Shelf tradition alive in your homes this Christmas season. Buy this brand NEW set that includes the classic picture book and your very own Elf! It’s only $19.97 (MSRP $30+).
